Reviews.Title: MADE IN CHINA
Reviews.Author: connie mack sutton
Reviews.Content: MADE IN CHINAthey worked better than the ones that came with the system but the set screws in one had no threads

Reviews.Title: very nice!
Reviews.Author: FLDonna
Reviews.Content: these are sturdy, highly customizable, easy to paint and mount. You can make them many different lengths for the perfect fit.  I replaced all of my outdoor mounts with these and I'm very happy with them.

Reviews.Title: Much better than SVAT camera mounts
Reviews.Author: Roger F.
Reviews.Content: My SVAT Security Camera System came with the cheesiest little pot-metal camera mounts you could imagine.  They could not be locked into position -- just a piss-poor design.  These VideoSecu mounts are head and shoulders better than the SVAT mounts.  I have no doubt that they will outlast the electronics and cameras in my new system.  Vastly higher quality, strength, flexibility, and design than the OEM mounts.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but get the job done
Reviews.Author: Joseph Rafferty
Reviews.Content: i have a Defender diy 4 ch dvr setup with cameras and the stock mounts snap so easy the yard is only up 2 months out of the year so they can take moving around much so i got this and i must sayWOW they have a lot and are crazy strong for the money with it came with the dvr seti don't think i will ever damage themfor the money worth every penny
